name: Fighter - The Fist

traits.name: Defense
traits.description: While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

traits.name: Second Wind
traits.description: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

traits.name: Martial Archetype - Mighty Strikes
traits.description: Your unarmed strike now deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage. Your unarmed strikes count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

traits.name: Martial Archetype - Lizard King’s Tail
traits.description: When you reach 7th level, you gain an agility and strength that undermines your opponents. You can use your bonus action to initiate a shove action to knock a target prone, and gain advantage on this shove action. If you succeed, you can then make a single attack on that prone target.

traits.name: Martial Archetype - Sturdy Mammoth Defense
traits.description:
You gain the ability to stop creatures in their tracks. When a creature who moves into your space intending to attack, or through it intending to move past you, you can use your reaction to attempt a grapple. If successful, you initiate a grapple contest. If you win, the creature is grappled and ends its movement, and the creature has disadvantage on any attacks while it is grappled.

This ability explicitly allows you to grapple a creature that is two size categories larger than you, but the grapple must end at the start of the creature’s next turn.

traits.name: Tough
traits.description: Your hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to twice your level when you gain this feat. Whenever you gain a level thereafter, your hit point maximum increases by an additional 2 hit points.

traits.name: Indomitable
traits.description: You can reroll a saving throw that you fail. If you do so, you must use the new roll, and you can’t use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

traits.name: Charging Horn
traits.description:
You gain strength through mobility.
If you move at least 10 feet in a round before making your first attack, any subsequent unarmed strikes during that round deal an additional 1d6 damage. Falling on an opponent, or somehow rising to attack them counts as movement explicitly for the purposes of this ability.

mythicActions.triggerRecharge: Recharges after a Short or Long Rest
mythicActions.triggerDescription: If the {NAME} would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to [X] hit points. Additionally, the {NAME} can now use the options in the “Mythic Actions” section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional [x]XP ([x] XP total) for defeating the {NAME} after this trait activates.
mythicActions.preamble: If the {NAME}'s mythic trait is active, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

regionalEffectDescription: The region containing the {NAME}'s lair is warped by the {NAME}'s magic. When the {NAME} dies, the effects fade after {1d10} days.
